topic_name: Coupled Flexural and Torsional Vibration Analysis of Composite Beams
description: Discusses the dynamic response of a composite beam under coupled flexural and torsional vibration, including the derivation of governing equations of motion and the effects of hysteretic damping.

topic_name: Geometric and Material Coupling in Composite Structures
description: Explores the impact of geometric and material coupling on the bending and torsional motion of composite structures and their effect on various engineering applications.

topic_name: Free Vibration Analysis of Composite Beams
description: Delves into the free vibration analysis of composite beams, discussing various approaches to solving structural vibration problems.

topic_name: Influence of Bending-Torsion Stiffness Coupling on Dynamic Pressure
description: Investigates the effect of bending-torsion stiffness coupling on the flutter and divergence dynamic pressure of a cantilever wing.
Discusses the concept of hysteretic damping in composite beams, which is the conversion of mechanical energy into thermal energy.

topic_name: Governing Equations for Coupled Bending and Torsional Vibration
description: Presents the development of the governing equations of motion for a coupled bending and torsional vibration of a composite beam.

topic_name: Shear Force, Bending Moment, and Torque Distributions
description: Discusses the mathematical expressions for the shear force, bending moment, and torque distributions across the length of a beam.
Explores the assumption of harmonic oscillation for certain variables in the equations.
Introduces the concept of non-dimensional length and the differential operator.

topic_name: Bending Displacement and Torsional Rotation Solutions
description: Presents the solutions to the bending displacement and torsional rotation.
Discusses the simplification of the equations into a sixth order ordinary differential equation.
Discusses the formulation of the dynamic stiffness matrix of the composite beam.

topic_name: Natural Frequency and Modal Loss Factor
description: Explores the calculation of the natural frequencies of the system and the modal loss factor.
Discusses the mode shapes for the analysis, which are used to understand the behavior of the system.

topic_name: Complex Natural Frequencies, Mode Shapes, and Modal Loss Factor
description: Discusses the computation of complex natural frequencies, mode shapes, and the modal loss factor.
Compares the results from the analysis with established results from literature to validate the analytical procedure and solutions obtained.
Summarizes the findings and discusses their implications for the study of coupled bending and torsional vibration of a composite beam.
